programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1746
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep876
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamu’s wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: Our Time Will Come
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, Fan Lan accidentally helps to rescue the writer Mao Dun and is recruited to join the anti-Japanese guerrilla. In order to protect Fan Lan, her mother takes Fan Lan’s place to relay military intelligence but was arrested. Fan Lan must now seek help from her ex-boyfriend who works for the Japanese…

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: After “Golden Chickenesss”, this is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife’s debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Angela arrives from another planet in search of her brother, fate has her unexpectedly meet handsome veterinarian Tian Yi, who risks himself to save her every time she gets into trouble. Though she is no believer of love, his actions eventually move her…

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: The Sinking City Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people living in ‘space capsules’ – large seminar rooms subdivided into small living quarters - struggle to fight for their ideal way of life in the prosperous yet divided city of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, a young translator colluded with the enemy and was cursed by a murdered comfort woman. Forty five years later, the translator's son who is a professor specializing in sleeping disorder does not believe in the sleep curse on his father and tries to dispel it with a horrifying sleep experiment.

programme.title: Hello Mr. Billionaire
programme.desc: An incompetent soccer goalkeeper for a minor league suddenly inherits thirty billion yuan in this mind-boggling comedy. In order to get the full amount, he must first spend one billion yuan on himself in a month without telling anyone about the task, and is also not allowed to own any assets at the end of it.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Duckweed
programme.desc: An emotional story about the reconciliation between a father and his son. Ah Lang, a young car racer from a small town, thinks that his father never understood his occupation and life. In a fateful occurrence, he is able to experience his father's legendary and interesting life in the past.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: An amateur surfer, who has been through several bad relationships, meets a kind-hearted tattoo artist. Everything is perfect until she confesses that she is an unusual “nail clipper monster”. With such a claim, can their love settle their differences?

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jack, a renowned archaeology professor, and his team are on a quest to locate a lost ancient Indian treasure. They find a diamond key unlocking the treasure, but it is snatched by a team of mercenaries. Jack leads his team to India and Dubai to beat the mercenaries to the treasure.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: In the mid-1980's Chu Yuan became internationally famous for starring as the nasty villain in Jackie Chan's groundbreaking worldwide hit, POLICE STORY. But for more than twenty-five years, he was famous as one of Hong Kong’s most respected directors of "Martial-art World" epics — often conceived by his remarkable collaborator, novelist Ku Lung. This was one of their last together for the Shaw Brothers Studio, but it's another revenge and mystery-tinged winner. Liu Yung and Sun Chien (the Korean kicking THE FIVE VENOM from Chang Cheh's internationally popular series) team to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, double-dealings, imposters, and one deadly duel after another. No less than three choreographers are on hand to handle the multitude of martial arts, making this one of Chu Yuan's most involving and exciting efforts ever.

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor'S Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: This is a story adapted from the popular Hong Kong comics, Old Master Q. Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr. Funnybone a.k.a. Old Master Q to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: The Voyage Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Naval Commandos
programme.desc: The Chinese Navy is attempting to defend its coastline from a Japanese attack, they send their commando unit led by Cui Hsia into the mainland to enlist help to thwart the Japanese before they attack. The commandos enlist the help of Song San and Shiao Liu to kill the Japanese officers led by Shan Mao and destroy their attacking ships.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Holy Flame Of The Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind…

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu Chia-hui, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Ode To Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Journey Of The Doomed
programme.desc: Journey Of The Doomed stars Tung Wei as a knight that finds himself protecting the life of a beautiful young lady, the lost Emperor's daughter and stalked by a bunch of assassins headed by kung fu actress extraordinaire Hui Ying-Hung.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Jin Yong, havoc breaks out when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, training manual, treasure map & a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Ambitious Prince Four (Liu Yung) attempts to kill the potential heir Prince Fourteen (Mok Siu-chung), but the latter is rescued by his aide Tseng Tsing (Hsu Shao-chiang). After an unsuccessful attempt to buy Tseng Tsing, Prince Four tries to murder him, but fails. He eventually hires Nien Keng-yao (Pai Piao), an outstanding martial artist, as his aide.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army’s help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family’s young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo’s stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: House Of Traps
programme.desc: It all started with THE FIVE VENOMS, the internationally loved kung-fu thriller which introduced director Chang Cheh's recurring cast of martial arts masters. It continued through more than a dozen high-flying, bloody good entertainments featuring the same action actors in pairs, trios, quartets, and, most memorably, quintets. While this is considered the last official "Venoms" movie, what a film it is. The title does not lie: an evil prince has secreted stolen imperial treasures in a building that practically bristles with booby-trapped blades. Bodies are pierced, limbs are cut off, and there's one plasma-spurting attack after another as heroes and rogues alike try to solve the secrets of the hell house. The core Venoms themselves choreograph the gory fun in this fond farewell to their worldwide film series sensation.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The Mad Monk lends a helping hand to the villagers and teaches all the bad guys a lesson they won't forget. A fun Caper with an underlying moral directed by Li Han-hsiang.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: The Story Of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Directed by Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu, Lily Ho and Ling Yun are two master thieves battling for brawn and brain; racing against each other for the famous and most prestigious gem in the world, The Venus' Tear Diamond. It is a delightful musical extravaganza of diamond and romance that is well-presented.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Cha’s “The Book and the Sword”. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Jai Hind 2
programme.desc: One man's fight to give good education to the poor.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: Brindavanam (Jr Ntr)
programme.desc: Kannan, a hairstylist with hearing and speech impairment, is a fan of superstar Vivek. When his lifelong dream of meeting the actor comes true, they form an unusual bond between them.

programme.title: Vinodaya Chitham
programme.desc: A self-centred and dominating man dies in an unfortunate car accident. However, upon his request, he is granted 90 more days to live for a second chance at making things right.

programme.title: Operation Java
programme.desc: A team of police officers from the Kochi cyber cell embarks on a mission to investigate a series of mysterious crimes and unlawful activities.

programme.title: Kavalthurai Ungal Nanban
programme.desc: When his wife is robbed and molested, Prabhu tries to report the crime. However, when the police take a dislike towards him, he wounds up on the receiving end of their cruelty.

programme.title: Uppu Karuvadu
programme.desc: Chandran, a filmmaker, is forced to cast the producer's daughter, Mahalakshmi, as the heroine in his movie. But Mahalakshmi cannot act and Chandran struggles to teach her how to act.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Salim
programme.desc: Salim, a doctor, runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon, his patience with the justice system snaps and he takes the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Enai Nokki Paayum Thotta
programme.desc: Lovers Raghu and Lekha are torn apart by Lekha's guardian, Kuberan, who forces her to act in films. Years later, Raghu receives a call from her informing him about his estranged brother.

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: The story is about politics surrounding land and the plight of farmers. It showed Vijay helping poor farmers in their fight against the industries that have acquired their lands.

programme.title: Danny
programme.desc: After the police inspector Kunthavai picks up a complex murder case for investigation, she takes the help of Danny, a smart police dog, to unearth a gang of dangerous criminals involved in serial killing.

programme.title: Maraindhu Irundhu Paarkum Marma Enna
programme.desc: A group of chain snatchers hatch an elaborate plan to carry out their operation. They target women and children but must ensure that they do not get caught.

programme.title: Pyaar Prema Kaadhal
programme.desc: Sree Kumar, a young man, falls in love with Sindhuja, a vivacious woman. However, complications soon arise and they part their separate ways only to reunite again.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: A life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Porr Adaikalam
programme.desc: Zee Tamil Movie

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Kaviya Thalaivan (Legend)
programme.desc: Two rival artists at Sivadas Swamigal's drama troupe compete in everything they do. While one of them goes on to become successful, the other fails in life.

programme.title: Kalavani Mapillai
programme.desc: In order to marry the love of his life, Deva tries to hide the fact that he cannot drive a vehicle from his future mother-in-law.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Manik Baasha
programme.desc: Rickshaw driver Manickam is a man who avoids violence at all costs. However, when his brother, a cop, gets into trouble with some goons, it triggers a set of events that revive Manickam's old self.

programme.title: Global Baba
programme.desc: Pehlwaan, a criminal, narrowly escapes a police encounter and uses a holy man's guise to hide. Though he soon amasses a large number of followers, he continues to carry out his illegal activities.

programme.title: Kadamban
programme.desc: Kadamban along with a group of villagers wages a war against a powerful businessman, who wants to destroy the forest surrounding Kadamban's village for his greed.

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu
programme.desc: Two brothers, Gollu and Pappu, confront Gustaad Khan, a terrorist, for blowing up their garage. However, he decides to take advantage of their innocence by making them deploy a bomb in Ludhiana.

programme.title: Judaai
programme.desc: To honour his late father's will, Shashikant and Gauri get married and soon have a son. However, marital problems arise when she starts suspecting him of having an affair with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.title: Lucknow Central
programme.desc: Kishen, an inmate in a Lucknow jail, yearns to be set free. When he learns that a few prisoners must form a band, he sees it as his ticket to freedom.

programme.title: Gori Tere Pyaar Mein
programme.desc: Sriram, a self-centred man, lies to his girlfriend, Dia, for his selfish gain. However, later, Sriram realises his mistake and has to fulfil a condition laid down by Dia to win her back.

programme.title: The Return Of Rebel
programme.desc: Rishi's father is killed by his own deceiving brother and a rival who team up against him. Rishi moves to Hyderabad and locates them despite their new fake identities.

programme.title: Fida
programme.desc: Jai falls in love with Neha, unaware of her and her boyfriend Vikram's evil intentions. He easily gets trapped in their conspiracy but decides to exact revenge while being on the run from the police.

programme.title: Zindagi Ek Sangharsh
programme.desc: When the lives of five individuals living in different places intersect, it results in the transformation of their persona and purpose.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta
programme.desc: Jai, a multimillionaire, is secretly in love with Tia whose husband he kills unintentionally while driving. After she loses her memory in the accident, she eventually falls for a guilt-ridden Jai.

programme.title: Auzaar
programme.desc: Suraj, a CBI officer, learns that his friend Yash and his father run an illegal business. He is assigned the task to investigate Yash but he decides to convince Yash to mend his ways.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Truth And Justice
programme.desc: Young Andres settles in a new farm. With rose-tinted lenses, he sets out to transform the farm into a prosperous paradise – all he needs is a healthy harvest, cooperative neighbours and a male heir. But, life turns out to be cruel and treacherous.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Spook
programme.desc: In an abandoned villa, three children witness a fierce fight between Jakob Stocking and a building contractor. Jakob kills him but returns later with his lawyer to turn himself in. As questions pile up, two detectives uncover a long-kept family secret.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.title: A Summer in Greece
programme.desc: On her first trip as driver, Rieke loses her company’s new coach. Faced with the risk of getting fired, she travels across Greece in search of it. Along the way, she meets the suave Yannis, who’s about to help her in more ways than she’s ever imagined.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: The End Of The World
programme.desc: Coliandro attends an illegal motorcycle race and witnesses a fatal accident. Together with Buffarini, they save the rider responsible for the accident and find refuge. However, they soon end up on the run from the vengeful brother of the deceased rider.

programme.title: Terri
programme.desc: Terri is an often bullied, overweight teen. When he decides to stop trying in school, the garrulous principal, Fitzgerald, becomes concerned. However, what was meant to be a counselling course for Terri becomes a journey of healing for both protagonists.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: 5-year old Denise is chosen to represent the class in a Chinese storytelling Competition. She struggles to find ways and means to make sure she excels in the competition. Unfortunately, it turns out that another classmate is taking over her place.

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.

programme.title: Truth And Justice
programme.desc: Young Andres settles in a new farm. With rose-tinted lenses, he sets out to transform the farm into a prosperous paradise – all he needs is a healthy harvest, cooperative neighbours and a male heir. But, life turns out to be cruel and treacherous.

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Suren’s idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.desc: Coliandro attends an illegal motorcycle race and witnesses a fatal accident. Together with Buffarini, they save the rider responsible for the accident and find refuge. However, they soon end up on the run from the vengeful brother of the deceased rider.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Terri
programme.desc: Terri is an often bullied, overweight teen. When he decides to stop trying in school, the garrulous principal, Fitzgerald, becomes concerned. However, what was meant to be a counselling course for Terri becomes a journey of healing for both protagonists.

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss
programme.desc: Ernesto and Filippo are two polar opposite, rival teachers: one is old-fashioned and straight-laced while the other is free and spontaneous. When they’re issued a challenge to fit into the shoes of the other, a series of hilarious misadventures befall them.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Soul Circle
programme.desc: Two detectives find a newborn baby in a basket on Lake Constance, with a mysterious message, and whose mother, Rita Hafner, was presumed murdered 6 months ago. Two detectives must investigate mysterious symbols and dark legends in order to save her.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Sleepless Nights
programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: 5-year old Denise is chosen to represent the class in a Chinese storytelling Competition. She struggles to find ways and means to make sure she excels in the competition. Unfortunately, it turns out that another classmate is taking over her place.

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford
programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Hacker

programme.title: Ignorance Is Bliss

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Mortal Club
programme.desc: In this black comedy, Inspector Coliandro discovers a series of gladiator-esque fights that involve fighters who are systematically drugged and manipulated. His sidekick for this case is Veena, a beautiful fighter who was herself once part of the system.

programme.title: A Summer in Oxford
programme.desc: Historian Nina returns to her alma mater Oxford to deliver a series of summer lectures. Soon, she finds herself caught in the crossfire of the affections of two men: one, her former advisor and old love interest and the other, a down-to-earth plumber.

programme.title: Inspector Coliandro: Special Match
programme.desc: In an attempt to help his good friend, Gamberini, with his gambling addiction, Inspector Coliandro infiltrates a clandestine gambling group. However, in doing so, he misses out on another of his case assignments and ends up endangering both their lives.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: When We Leave
programme.desc: German-born Umay flees a toxic marriage in Istanbul and takes her young son with her to Berlin. There, her conservative family rejects her return and she escapes again to protect her son. This is Umay’s journey of self-determination against all odds.

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Copy Cat
programme.desc: A rookie and veteran detective work together on the case of a murdered young journalist. They quickly arrest a prime suspect who seems all but surely the killer. Yet, the ease of everything unsettles them – something isn’t right but what exactly?

programme.desc: After Luca is kidnapped by his father, Thony enlists the FBI to find her son. Meanwhile, an incident involving Chris forces Fiona to shield her son by any means necessary.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep169
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories including root beer, mini chocolate cakes and tamari soy sauce.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Volcano - A look at how without volcanoes, there would be no life on Earth. Although destructive, magma from the planet's molten core builds land, and mineral-rich ash from eruptions fertilises the surface.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Galapagos - Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.desc: Pulled Under - On the Parana river, countless fishermen have been violently pulled into the water and some have even mysteriously disappeared. Cyril ventures deeper and deeper into caiman to answer one question: what beast could possibly be strong enough to pull a man under?

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Time and brine combine to produce the perfect pickle; see the creation of Fizzies drink tablets; plus maple cream chocolates and chocolate bliss balls.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: How can a glass dome be built big enough to house a mountain? What happens when a major railway station is completely taken apart and rebuilt - during the rush hour?

programme.desc: Volcano - A look at how without volcanoes, there would be no life on Earth. Although destructive, magma from the planet's molten core builds land, and mineral-rich ash from eruptions fertilises the surface.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep19
programme.desc: 50 million Big Hunks of peanutty nougat are produced every year; watch potato pellets become Smart Fries in just two minutes flat; and see how one million gummy bears are produced every hour.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep20
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories, including pretzel nuggets, French fried onions and Italian Brio soda.

programme.title: Reindeer Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan travels into the wilderness of Lapland to see nature's greatest spectacle, the Northern Lights, learning essential skills from the indigenous people along the way.

programme.title: North America with Simon Reeve S1 Ep5
programme.desc: In Belize, Simon dives on a coral reef off, visits a rescue centre for orphaned manatees and witnesses a gun battle between armed park rangers and intruders from neighbouring Guatemala intent on clearing the rainforest for farming.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Cape in South Africa is struck by a devastating double pronged attack, of a violent storm and catastrophic wildfires that overwhelm the emergency services.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Senegal - Robson heads to Senegal to try for the Offshore Grand Slam, and finds that the country's coast provides some of the best fishing in the world.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom Ep4
programme.desc: For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8
programme.desc: Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Mexico's Artificial Reefs Ep5
programme.desc: From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts Ep3
programme.desc: A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom Ep4
programme.desc: For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 - Mexico's Artificial Reefs Ep5
programme.desc: From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Africa's Baboons Ep7
programme.desc: The baboon is one of the world’s most successful and dominant primates. Ranging throughout Africa, we explore how these fascinating animals have adapted to thrive in mountains, deserts, along the shores of acidic lakes, and even on the edge of a mighty ocean.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts Ep3
programme.desc: A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom Ep4
programme.desc: For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun Ep8

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Stinkers Ep1
programme.desc: In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Winged Weirdos Ep2
programme.desc: One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Monkey Garden Ep1
programme.desc: At the southern edge of the Pantanal, the world’s largest tropical wetland on Earth, there’s a placelike no other, and a wildlife so diverse scientists scramble to understand the variety of ways animals interact with each other. The highlands of the Bodoquena Hills are the entrance to the murky wetlands of the Pantanal. Here, the waters are crystal clear, filtered by a limestone formation over 600 million year old, that offers a clear window into the life of these streams. Waterfalls, tufa dams, caves and pristine rivers with a visibility of up to fifty meters abound.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Zanzibar's Poison Monkey Ep8
programme.desc: Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungle—and find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts Ep5
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 - Joey's Journey Ep2
programme.desc: Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, who’s trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts Ep5
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 - Joey's Journey Ep2
programme.desc: Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, who’s trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Short Grass Plains Ep1
programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Winged Weirdos Ep2
programme.desc: One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Socorro Islands Ep2
programme.desc: A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 - Bahamas Ep3
programme.desc: The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Creature Comforts Ep5
programme.desc: This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat 1 - Joey's Journey Ep2
programme.desc: Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, who’s trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Short Grass Plains Ep1
programme.desc: The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migration—the crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Return to the Mara Ep2
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 - Bird Paradise Ep2
programme.desc: Every year, the southern wetlands of the Pantanal become a bird paradise as over 650 species of rare and iconic birds congregate here for the breeding season.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 - Iceland: Fire Ep1
programme.desc: Learn about the world’s largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - To the Rescue Ep6
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, including “ranch manager” Barclay, a Great Dane who happens to be a gifted horse whisperer. In Africa, a tiny marmoset called Thor has become obsessed with two young rescued mongooses.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.desc: Fishing Around Watauga Lake - After visiting Watauga Lake for years, a family of five from Rogersville, TN, is ready to buy a home to enjoy the area whenever they want.

programme.title: The Holzer Files S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Blood In The Water - Hans believed a grisly murder haunted Staten Island's Conference House, where in 1776 a last-minute meeting failed to stop the American Revolution.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters S6 Ep2
programme.desc: South Sea Style - Drew heads for elegant country pile so overstuffed with great antiques that the owners have to sell some items just to make house space.

programme.title: Aliens In Alaska S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Alien Flight Plan - A routine flight turns terrifying when a bush pilot witnesses unsettling UFO activity.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Deadly Cures - Two sisters journey from London to Washington in pursuit of a health cure with deadly consequences. And a town is divided over the belief that a ghost is haunting local women.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Doll Collector - A string of disappearances in the American West leads investigators to a horrifying residence, and the gravesites of young girls are being desecrated by a disturbed doll collector.

programme.title: The Holzer Files S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Blood In The Water - Hans believed a grisly murder haunted Staten Island's Conference House, where in 1776 a last-minute meeting failed to stop the American Revolution.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Force Of Madagascar - Jack taps into the mysterious energies of Madagascar and drinks its most potent spirits. He meets mystical monkeys and concocts a snake blood cocktail.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters S6 Ep3
programme.desc: Attics And Art - Salvage supremo Drew Pritchard visits a 400-year-old manor house and discovers a beautiful, forgotten treasure in a dusty attic.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep11
programme.desc: California Dreaming On Kona - A couple have dreamed of moving to Hawaii since visiting for their honeymoon. They want a single-family home with a big kitchen.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep12
programme.desc: Deep Dive On Maui - Doug and Noranne believe it’s finally the right time to make a permanent move to Maui. Their wish list includes a large garden and easy access to the beach.

programme.title: Aliens In Alaska S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Alien Flight Plan - A routine flight turns terrifying when a bush pilot witnesses unsettling UFO activity.

programme.title: Railroad Alaska S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Frozen Danger - Off-grid settlers Jim, Nancy and John face being stranded without basic necessities when an avalanche hits and blocks the track.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Deadly Cures - Two sisters journey from London to Washington in pursuit of a health cure with deadly consequences. And a town is divided over the belief that a ghost is haunting local women.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Doll Collector - A string of disappearances in the American West leads investigators to a horrifying residence, and the gravesites of young girls are being desecrated by a disturbed doll collector.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S3 Ep13
programme.desc: The Magic Of Ireland - Jack Maxwell explores the magic of Ireland through its stories, people and drinks.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep13
programme.desc: Fishing For A New Life On Maui - Tod wants to leave California for a slower pace of life on Maui. He hopes to find a move-in ready condo with an updated kitchen and a pool.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S11 Ep1
programme.desc: Finding Inspiration On Kauai - A couple follows their dream of moving to Hawaii and settles on Kauai. They hope to find a condo with beach access where they can live in luxury.

programme.title: Aliens In Alaska S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Night Stalkers - An extraterrestrial stalker leaves a family frozen in fear outside of Juneau, Alaska.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Hate The Game - A sideshow performer is gunned down and everyone in his family is a suspect, and a beloved singer in a church choir is resurrected from the dead.

programme.title: True Nightmares: Tales Of Terror S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Trick Or Treat - After a family goes trick-or-treating on Halloween night, they rush their young son to the hospital, where he dies from unknown causes.

programme.desc: Recorded live at the Hull City Hall, legendary frontman Liam Gallagher performs a one-off acoustic set of songs from his solo albums along with some Oasis classics, exclusively for MTV Unplugged.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2010
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2010 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep32
programme.desc: Blayde - Dozer and the crew must find a way to outsmart a clever bully named Blayde, a new ememy who kidnapped George and destroyed the Dozeratop mounds

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem In Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep18
programme.desc: School Break - When Akila invites Cleo home for school break, she has to compete for her parents’ attention.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Dang, I'M Rich! / Power Play - Cousin Ashley sets out to strike it rich and buy himself a mansion. Archibald explores Crackridge during a blackout with a new pal.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Give Peas A Chance - Wilbur passes a law to increase the healthy eating in Beanotown, replacing all foods with peas…of the mushy variety! The gang must avoid the people of Beanotown who are rapidly transforming into Zompeas, from the over consumption of the addictive green goo. Dennis uses the only un-mushed peas in town to sabotage Wilbur’s mush making factory and save the day!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Fan - Walter attempts to sabotage The Dinmakers' chance of reaching fame. He will stop at nothing - even wearing a frock, becoming Wanda and pretending to LOVE Dennis in order to break up the band!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep58
programme.desc: Before They Hatch - A gargoyle with ties to San Lorenzo emerges from the portal and Puss must help find her hidden eggs before they hatch and feed on whatever or whoever is around!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep6
programme.desc: Eat Pray Shove - Clover is forced to take a vacation, and while she's away, she meets the handsome and free-spirited Sage Moondancer.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep68
programme.desc: The S. S. Friend-Ship - After the PALs encourage Maricela to make new friends, she forms the exclusive "Poshy Posse" with Priya, Sahir and Alex.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap To The Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As she’s preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future – and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Squishy Predicament Of Stanley Peet’S Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison In The Pit Of The Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep58
programme.desc: Return Of Thor Bonecrusher - When Thor Bonecrusher is needed to rescue hostages taken by the Bandits, Snoutlout tries to help but accidentally brings to life Thor's evil twin – Anti-Thor – who sides with the Bandits

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: 3 Below: Tales Of Arcadia Ep22
programme.desc: The Fall Of House Tarron - Two royal teenage aliens and their bodyguard flee a surprise takeover of their home planet by an evil dictator and crash land in Arcadia. Now on the run from intergalactic bounty hunters, they struggle to blend in and adapt to the bizarre world of high school all the while attempting to repair their ship so they can return and defend their home planet.
