programme.desc: Miracle On Harvey Street / I Know What You Did Last Summer - Lotta brings Hanukkah to Harvey Street with a live holiday special. Stu and Audrey get their hands on a jet pack to blast into space.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Rupert Builds A Nest - Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert And The Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: My Life Me Ep3
programme.desc: Big Man On Canvas - Raffi's win at the district art show hurtles Birch into the five stages of grief, her reactions throwing her podmates for a loop. Luckily, Liam's hip to what's going on thanks to a book Mr. Towes has assigned him. While Sandra trails Liam in hopes of seeing some emotional fireworks on Birch's part, Raffi can't quite get over the idea that Birch wouldn't be happy for his success.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep4
programme.desc: The Pencil Assassin - Birch is initially aghast when Jason publishes her Manga “sample” in the school paper, but soon succumbs to the allure of popularity. As Birch's social status soars, her podmates become laughingstocks. Sandra's retaliation eventually brings the two girls together in their fight against the unethical editor of The Cosmos Chronicle.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dinmaker Diva - A bungled attempt at a stunt leads to Dennis inadvertently becoming an internet star and Beanotown celebrity! But fame is fleeting and Dennis is soon replaced by Walter’s cat who can play the piano. Dennis has to stage the best stunt yet to gain back his fame, putting Gnasher in peril!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lost Sweetie - Mrs Creecher confiscates Dennis’ rare sour sweetie - The Tongue Destroyer! Dennis is desperate to get the sweet back and takes his friends on an adventure to the school’s Confiscatorium, hidden in the depths of Bash Street School!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep2
programme.desc: From Days Long Ago - The Blue Lion delivers the team to an alien planet where they discover a mysterious castle. Inside, they awaken an alien princess who sends them on a mission to find the remaining lions.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep28
programme.desc: Speed - Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep7
programme.desc: Reign Of Fireworms - Fireworms invade Dragon's Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Costly Conundrum Of The Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free - Riding Academy Ep69
programme.desc: The Gavel Of Justice - Someone stole Bebe's gavel and used it to break a window at the academy! Everyone seems to suspect Alex ... but Pru is certain he's innocent.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep9
programme.desc: Peabody'S Parents/ Galileo - Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit; Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Sick Day - When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep13
programme.desc: Why Vulture Is Bald - You see there was time when Vulture was not bald. Oh no, Vulture's head was covered in a beautiful crown of golden plumage! Vain Vulture never shut up about her golden feathers and was obsessed about making them ‘as golden as the sun!'. One day Vulture decides to fly up to the sun, but her precious feathers get burnt! Vulture decides to sooth her smoking feathers with golden honey which she steals from the bees. The bees are not pleased and Vulture sticks her head down Aardvark's burrow. However, Aardvark loves feathers all covered in honey and when Vulture surfaces she is as bald as… well, as a Vulture! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep14
programme.desc: Why Giraffe Has A Long Neck - You see there was a time when Giraffe didn't have a long neck. Her neck was all short and stumpy and she was a very delicate eater. All the food in Tinga Tinga seemed to make her tummy go funny. Then one day Lion suggests she try some honey. With the Bees permission, Giraffe tries to lick the honey… but it is deep, deep inside the tree. Giraffe squeezes her head into the honey tree and then EEEeeek! Her head gets stuck! Summer, Autumn, Winter pass by with Giraffe's head stuck inside the tree, but she is quite happy because the honey is so delicious. The tree grows and Giraffe's neck gets longer and longer! After a whole year ‘POP!' she manages to pull herself free and from that day on Giraffe has a very long neck and can eat the freshest leaves on the very tops of the trees! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep13
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sticky Putty - Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Accidents - Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep33
programme.desc: Battle - D-Structs becomes super-charged when Skrap-It installs a special spark bug, so the Trux must find their own spark bug to battle D-Structs' new power

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep19
programme.desc: The Swiss Mess - The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeard’s chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep33
programme.desc: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish - When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Oh's life in the process

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep19
programme.desc: Xerx Works - On a mission to destroy the factory that manufactures Octavian’s Xerx warriors, Cleo and Pharaoh Yosira butt heads over who’s in charge and Mihos masquerades as a cabbage.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

But in a disastrous turn of events, Screwtop is on the loose with the brain of Paul the potato and Pieface is left with a potato with the brain of Screwtop to help get him through the test!

programme.desc: Are We There Yeti? - The gang go on an adventure in search of the Beanotown Yeti, but when the Yeti grabs JJ and makes a run for his cave, Dennis and his chums must come to the rescue!

programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out there’s a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep42
programme.desc: Hero Effect / Vr The World - Fredo's filming a second movie -- and starring in it, too. But his bloated ego's too much to bear. Richie builds a game powered by RichCoins.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cloud Shepherd - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: My Life Me Ep5
programme.desc: The Makeover - Liam starts acting even stranger when he falls in love with an older woman:15-year-old Cynthia. Birch, Sandra and Raffi conspire to give Liam a complete makeover to make him more appealing. Their plans backfire, making Liam look crazy instead of attractive.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep6
programme.desc: The Pom-Pom Girl - Sandra rises to the challenge of becoming a cheerleader, an act that stuns and mortifies her podmates. As Sandra succumbs to Amelia's ridiculous hazing rituals Pod 4 becomes increasingly uneasy. But we soon learn that Sandra is only doing back flips to ensure her nemesis' ultimate humiliation.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Pies - Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119

programme.desc: Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of “Super Bouncy Tires,” he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Stuntmania! - Darington has built the ultimate stunt-track, and every Monster Machine in town is coming to see the show! But when a jealous Crusher tricks Darington and sends him far, far away, it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep521

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep522
programme.desc: A Load of Litterbugs! - On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep114

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Meet Josh! - Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep110

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118

programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep301

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep108

programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep208
programme.desc: No Such Luck / Frog Wild - The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck so they ban him from attending their activities. // When Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Fast Feud / Never Friending Story - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Pony Car / Wedding Planners - When Annie and her friends are invited to a fancy party, Pony decides they can't show up on foot and builds them a car. // Annie and Pony try to use Mom and Dad's marriage certificate to claim a free vacation, but realize the certificate is a fake!

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Police Navidad / Evil Layers - It's Christmas Eve and Officer Duke DeTain is the only cop on patrol without a partner. // Duke DeTain and Shirley Keeper investigate the true identity of the Master Criminal.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Buster / Shirley Keeper - Firefighter Buster Lloyd gets the opportunity to live out his fantasy of being a police officer. // Sanitation worker, Shirley Keeper, educates local residents on how to take care of their City.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Jinxed! - After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: The Toy - A favorite toy of Theodore's is lost on a rafting trip but then mysteriously shows up at the house, and it's alive!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep170
programme.desc: Free Samples / Home Sweet Rubble - After Plankton drives away Mr. Krabs' customers, Mr. Krabs is forced to give out free Krabby Patties to try to win them back. // SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and he needs all of his friends to help him remodel it!

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Chapa's Crush - When Danger Force fails a mission because Chapa is distracted by a crush, the gang has to track down her obsession and get their friend back to her normal self.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: Fairly Odder S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Fairies Away! Part 2 - Viv and Roy must come together to rescue Cosmo and Wanda so they can thwart Vicky and Mr. Crocker's evil plan to take over the Fairy World.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep306
programme.desc: 15 Candles - Already planning Ronnie Anne's quinceañera, Rosa decides to train Ronnie Anne - for the next 3 years!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Rook, Line and Sinker - Carlos gets Carl into chess to keep him out of trouble, but Carl takes his rule of the kingdom literally!

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Eye Can't - Trying to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes a new pair of glasses that actually makes her eyesight worse.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Time Amok - When The Protostar is fractured in time by an anomaly, Hologram Janeway must synchronize the disjointed crew and save their ship before it destructs.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep181
programme.desc: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby - SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep182
programme.desc: Little Yellow Book / Bumper to Bumper - Squidward finds SpongeBob's diary, and starts reading it out loud in the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob once again fails his driving test, forcing Mrs. Puff to think outside the box--and off the road.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Dog's Best Friend / Out of Shape - Angus tries to woo the only dog on the mountain that doesn't like him: Jelly. // Parker becomes overly obsessed with a game to the point where the little nimbus isn't a cloud anymore.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Linc or Swim / Changing the Baby - Lincoln purchases a kiddie pool, and things get out of hand when all 10 of his sisters want to use it. // After noticing that none of his sisters share his interests, Lincoln attempts to mold Lily into his mini-me.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Hand-Me-Downer / Sleuth or Consequences - After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynn's cool BMX bike without telling her. // Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Bowled Over / Disaster Express - Annie takes up bowling to impress a boy and Pony gets fingers! // When Pony thinks the subway ride to an escape room is the escape room, Annie needs to stop him from causing a public transportation disaster.

programme.title: It's Pony S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Pony Almighty / Annie the Influencer - Pony unearths a relic with a crude etching that seems to suggest he's an ancient god of mischief. // When Annie gets obsessed with a new social media app, Pony needs to do whatever it takes to bring her back to break the spell.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: The Krusty Bucket / Squid's on a Bus - Plankton creates a clone of himself and Mr. Krabs, but neither restaurant is safe from the newcomer. // Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep250
programme.desc: Broken Alarm / Karen's Baby - SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time. // Karen quickly learns that kids grow up too fast after her new child arrives in the mail.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S01 Ep1
programme.desc: Help Wanted / Reef Blowers / Tea at the Treedome - SpongeBob finally applies for a job at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob finds the perfect use for his high powered reef blower. // SpongeBob meets Sandy Cheeks for the first time.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep125
